name: Stop the Duck
description:
The duck is walking off the cliff. Why? It’s destiny. Even if someone tries to shoot or catch them, the duck can’t stop, won’t stop, don’t stop. But… will you fly in and try to save the duck? Can you reverse their destiny? Can you block their path? Type single words to Try to Stop the Duck from Walking off a Cliff… Cow.

Credits

Production, Art, Audio - Aung Khant

Programming, Writing - Megapig9001 (https://megapig9001.itch.io/)

Art, Audio - Ethan Flaker

Art - Anzaii

Music - Peacock Roy (https://twitter.com/aWitchNamedMags)

The Music Track featured is a derivative work of the Touhou Project series. Touhou Project is made and owned by Team Shanghai Alice.
